programmes.show_description: Tense action with Bruce Willis. A troubled sheriff steps in when a group of small-town thugs take a local doctor hostage, demanding the truth behind a teenager's disappearance a decade earlier. (2021)
How news bulletins used to look. The GREAT! network takes you back in time, remembering stories from this week back then.

Tense action with Bruce Willis. A troubled sheriff steps in when a group of small-town thugs take a local doctor hostage, demanding the truth behind a teenager's disappearance a decade earlier. (2021)
Mannering is convinced that his old friend Louisa Trenton has been murdered and must convince the police it wasn't suicide.
Peel faces a race against time to save Steed who is unknowingly destined for a desert island with a killer.
Join officers from New Zealand Police as they patrol the streets and race to the scene of real-life emergency calls.
Thrilling war drama with Richard Conte and Rory Calhoun. Set in WWII, a small team of US commandos have to save an American Captain from the clutches of the German army. (1968)

While arresting two gunmen at the saloon, Jake Hoyt saves Hollister from being shot in the back by a third gunman but he has an ulterior motive for saving Hollister's life .
Two young Apaches clash over the future of the tribe should do after their Chief dies. One want to kill the white men whilst the other seeks peace .
The team are tasked with investigating enemy agent Juventor. Can Steed and the team stop him before he has the capability to sell secret information to the highest bidder ?
Steed and Peel's investigation into the disappearance of an agent becomes far more sinister when they stumble across a plot to kill the Prime Minister.
Mannering takes steps to stop the robbery of an antiques collection.

After a miner is killed during an Indian attack, it's up to Hollister to calm down an angry mob and reason with greedy miners .
Hollister is overcome by an outlaw his two partners and is forced to lead them across the desert .
During what he hoped to be the last robbery of his crime-filled career, Morgan MacQuarie imperils the lives of a group of hostages including Victoria and Wind.
Can Steed and the team discover the identity of the person who seemingly holds a grudge against them before it is too late ?
Steed and Peel investigate when national security is compromised by individuals demonstrating child-like behaviour. Can The Avengers unearth a common link?
While searching for a missing crate of valuable antiques, Cordelia discovers the murder and is promptly abducted by the killer.
Explosive action sequel with Sandra Bullock. A luxury cruise turns perilous when a crazed hacker seizes control, steering the ship toward disaster. Also starring Jason Patric and Willem Dafoe. (1997)
